verbose_text: To explore the role of IL-27 signaling in the development of neuropathic pain, we evaluated the levels of mRNA expression of IL-27 subunits (p28 and Ebi3) and Wsx1, a specific subunit of its receptor, in ipsilateral lumbar DRGs (L3-L5) and spinal cord of WT animals after SNI induction.
evidence: expression of IL-27 subunits (p28 and Ebi3) and Wsx1
